payload.name: cognitive-memory-hierarchy-maps-to-caches-and-stores
payload.title: Cognitive memory hierarchy maps to caches and stores: tier memory explicitly
payload.formal: working memory (fast/volatile), episodic memory (append-only), semantic memory (index).
payload.apm2_mapping: working context is lossy and budgeted; episodic memory is ledger; semantic memory is future index, but must be versioned and invalidated like caches.
